text: L6.3. Counting cache hits Given a direct-mapped cache with 8 cache slots, 16-byte blocks, and a main memory that has 12-bit addresses. Calculate the total number of hits if the following addresses are accessed in order. 0x80b The initial configuration of the cache is given below: _index | Tag 000 | 10000 o111 10101 o101 01001 10100 o011 o111 integer hits @ Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
